animeDescription: A regular old scarecrow has stood in a field for twenty years when one day, after a lightning storm, he comes to life. He becomes friends with the daughter of a scarecrow shop owner.
animeStaff: [['Takeuchi Yoshio', ['Director']], ['Kameyama Koichiro', ['Music']], ['Miyano Takashi', ['Art Director']], ['Hiyoshi Kei', ['Series Composition']]]
